item.title: Convert Seurat to Scanpy h5ad
item.author: Author
item.description: IMPORTANT UPDDATE: 2023-02-21 MuDataSeurat Recommended!!! MuDataSeurat write h5ad file directly. easy install and simple use Refer to MuDataSeurat Install Please Install my fork which works for anndata >=0.8 1 2 3 # in R console ## install myfork, which compatible with latest anndata remotes::install_github("zqfang/MuDataSeurat", force = T) Usage (Optional) Step 1: Slim down a Seurat object.
